narration: A Gambler is looks fidgety and anxious.
dialogs: You approach the Gambler. Before you can speak, he looks at you and says: 'You! You look like a man with answers! I need to win this weekend's lottery. Can you help a brother out?'
Man o' man, I really need to win. You got some numbers man?
No! That ain't right. Get your head outta the gutters man. I need to win!
Dear Lord, this must be it! Alright alright, if I win, you'll get a cut, but really I'm the one taking all the risk.
I hope I win, I hope I win.
